verses.verse: He said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Come up<WH5927> to Yahweh,<WH3068> you,<WH175> and Aaron, Nadab,<WH5070> and Abihu,<WH30> and seventy<WH7657> of the elders<WH2205> of Israel;<WH3478> and worship<WH7812> from a distance.<WH7350>
Moses<WH4872> alone shall come near<WH5066> to Yahweh,<WH3068> but they shall not come near,<WH5066> neither shall the people<WH5971> go up with him.<WH5927>"

Moses<WH4872> came<WH935> and told<WH5608> the people<WH5971> all the words<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and all the ordinances;<WH4941> and all the people<WH5971> answered<WH6030> with one<WH259> voice,<WH6963> and said,<WH559> "All the words<WH1697> which Yahweh<WH3068> has spoken<WH559> will we do.<WH6213>"

Moses<WH4872> wrote<WH3789> all the words<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and rose up early<WH7925> in the morning,<WH1242> and built<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> under the mountain,<WH2022> and twelve pillars<WH4676> for the twelve<WH8147> tribes<WH7626> of Israel.<WH3478>

He sent<WH7971> young men<WH5288> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> who offered<WH5927> burnt offerings<WH5930> and sacrificed<WH2076> peace<WH8002> offerings<WH5930> of cattle<WH6499> to Yahweh.<WH3068>
Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> half<WH2677> of the blood<WH1818> and put<WH7760> it in basins,<WH101> and half<WH2677> of the blood<WH1818> he sprinkled<WH2236> on the altar.<WH4196>

He took<WH3947> the book<WH5612> of the covenant<WH1285> and read<WH7121> it in the hearing<WH241> of the people,<WH5971> and they said,<WH559> "All that Yahweh<WH3068> has spoken<WH1696> will we do,<WH6213> and be obedient.<WH8085>"

Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> the blood,<WH1818> and sprinkled<WH2236> it on the people,<WH5971> and said,<WH559> "Look,<WH1818> this is the blood of the covenant,<WH1285> which Yahweh<WH3068> has made<WH3772> with you concerning all these words.<WH1697>"
Then Moses,<WH4872> Aaron,<WH175> Nadab,<WH5070> Abihu,<WH30> and seventy<WH7657> of the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> went up.<WH5927>
They saw<WH7200> the God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478> Under his feet<WH7272> was like a paved<WH3840> work<WH4639> of sapphire stone,<WH5601> like the<WH6106> skies<WH8064> for clearness.<WH2892>
He didn't<WH7971> lay his hand<WH3027> on the nobles<WH678> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478> They saw<WH2372> God,<WH430> and ate<WH398> and drank.<WH8354>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Come up<WH5927> to me on the mountain,<WH2022> and stay here,<WH5414> and I will give you the tables<WH3871> of stone<WH68> with the law<WH8451> and the commands<WH4687> that I have written,<WH3789> that you may teach them.<WH3384>"
Moses<WH4872> rose up<WH6965> with Joshua,<WH3091> his servant,<WH8334> and Moses<WH4872> went up<WH5927> onto God<WH430>'s Mountain.<WH2022>

He said<WH559> to the elders,<WH2205> "Wait<WH3427> here<WH2088> for us,<WH7725> until we come again to you.<WH175> Behold, Aaron and Hur<WH2354> are with you.<WH4310> Whoever is<WH1167> involved in a dispute<WH1697> can<WH1167> go to them.<WH5066>"
Moses<WH4872> went up<WH5927> on the mountain,<WH2022> and the cloud<WH6051> covered<WH3680> the mountain.<WH2022>

The glory<WH3519> of Yahweh<WH3068> settled<WH7931> on Mount<WH2022> Sinai,<WH5514> and the cloud<WH6051> covered<WH3680> it six<WH8337> days.<WH3117> The seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> he called<WH7121> to Moses<WH4872> out of the midst<WH8432> of the cloud.<WH6051>

The appearance<WH4758> of the glory<WH3519> of Yahweh<WH3068> was like devouring<WH398> fire<WH784> on the top<WH7218> of the mountain<WH2022> in the eyes<WH5869> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

Moses<WH4872> entered<WH935> into the midst<WH8432> of the cloud,<WH6051> and went up<WH5927> on the mountain;<WH2022> and Moses<WH4872> was on the mountain<WH2022> forty<WH705> days<WH3117> and forty<WH705> nights.<WH3915>
